IntroductionÂ¶

To work with pygrass you need a up-to-date version of GRASS GIS 7. You can obtain a recent version following the information provided on the main Web site of GRASS, and you can read more about compilation on the GRASS GIS Wiki

The only action before starting to work with pygrass is to launch GRASS GIS 7 and from the console launch python or ipython (the second one is the recommended way)

Read more about how to work with Raster, Vector, Attributes, Modules.
